thread.title: Rock legend Chuck Berry dies at 90
thread.title_full: Rock legend Chuck Berry dies at 90

author: Sarah Deen
title: Rock legend Chuck Berry dies at 90

locations.name: rock and roll hall of fame

text:
Chuck Berry has died aged 90 (Picture: Heikki Saukkomaa/REX/Shutterstock) Rocker Chuck Berry has died at the age of 90.
Police in Missouri confirmed to the BBC that the musician passed away.
Berry was found unresponsive on Saturday afternoon.
He was best known for such songs as You Never Can Tell, Johnny B. Goode and Nadine.
He was inducted into the Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame in 1986 and was set to release Chuck, his first album since Rock It in 1979, this year.
More to follow.
